ISSUE.TITLE: Swagger spec not included in installed package
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The `swagger/annif.yaml` file is not included, so after install the package can't be used.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: move config.py inside package, to annif/config.py, so it's available after install. Fixes #196

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Make sure annif.yaml is included in installed package. Fixes #199
Make sure annif.yaml is included in installed package. Fixes #199
